title: While listening to Quran, is it permissible to pause before an ayah is completed? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: so is it permissible while listening to in audio to pause before the ir is completed it is inappropriate but it's permissible if the ayah is ayatul kursi and you're listening to the audio and you stop it you haven't done a sin but this is inappropriate it's best that you let the ayah finish or at least the phrase where the meaning is complete is finished and allah knows best
